definition: Baiyue, generic term for southern ethnic groups
hundred/numerous/all kinds of
surname Bai
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more

sentences.english: Madame Xian Tai was the chief of the Baiyue ethnic group in the Lingnan region.
sentences.chinese: 冼夫人是嶺南百越族的一位首領。

sentences.english: As descendant of Baiyue ethnic groups, Dai nationality has a centuries-old tradition of rice-fanning.
sentences.chinese: 傣族作爲百越後裔，有着悠久的種植稻穀傳統。

sentences.english: Nanxiong has a long history of Baiyue Spring and Autumn Period, the Warring States is Chu.
sentences.chinese: 南雄歷史悠久，春秋時爲百越地，戰國屬楚。

sentences.english: Baiyue Tribe originated from costal regions, and later, the tribe moved inland.
sentences.chinese: 百越族源於沿海地區，後遷居內地。

sentences.english: Baiyue, an ancestry of the Bouyei, was one of the nationalities that were in possession of the earliest printing technologies in China.
sentences.chinese: 布依族先民百越是我國印染工藝起源最早的民族之一。

definition: South Vietnam/South Vietnamese
the state of Chu, one of the most important of the small states contending for power in China between 770 and 223 BC, located around present-day Hubei
former southernmost province of the Chinese Empire, now northern Vietnam
Han Dynasty term for the Roman Empire 羅馬帝國|罗马帝国[Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2]
Han Chinese name for an ancient Central Asia country
Yue state/generic term for states in south China or southeast Asia at different historical periods
ancient people of central Asia during the Han dynasty
the Xirong, an ancient ethnic group of Western China from the Zhou Dynasty onwards/Xionites (Central Asian nomads)
common term for non-Han peoples in former times, not exclusively derogatory/barbarian
Eastern Barbarians, non-Han tribe living to the east of China c 2200 BC
punitive expedition to the south
Cangwu county in Wuzhou 梧州[Wu2 zhou1], Guangxi
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
Qin Dynasty (221-207 BC)
Outer Mongolia (lit. north of the Gobi Desert)
ancient country
